:table-caption: Data Set

.A table with an header row and a title
|===
|Cell in column 1, row 1|Cell in column 2, row 1

|Cell in column 1, row 1|Cell in column 2, row 1
|Cell in column 1, row 2|Cell in column 2, row 2
|Cell in column 1, row 3|Cell in column 2, row 3
|===

.A table with an header row and a title
|===
|Cell in column 1, row 1|Cell in column 2, row 1

|Cell in column 1, row 1|Cell in column 2, row 1
|Cell in column 1, row 2|Cell in column 2, row 2
|Cell in column 1, row 3|Cell in column 2, row 3
|===
